name: UploadNotificationRule
description: Notify if no upload has occurred by 12pm
actions: System.out.println("No upload has occurred for " + Jurisdiction.name + " by 12pm")

name: ProcessingErrorNotificationRule
description: Notify if upload completes with processing errors

name: DigestNotificationRule
actions: for (DataStream : dataStreams) { System.out.println("Data Stream: " + DataStream.name + ", Upload Count: " + DataStream.uploadCount) }
